TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定将用于程序集中组件安装的 COM+ 应用程序的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the COM+ application to be used for the install of the components in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此特性标记的类。The following example demonstrates the use of this attribute to mark a class. span.span: The name of the COM+ application.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定将用于组件安装的 COM+ 应用程序的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the name of the COM+ application to be used for the install of the components.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此特性标记类。The following example illustrates the use of this attribute to mark a class. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在程序集中包含组件的 COM+ 应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the name of the COM+ application that contains the components in the assembly.
The name of the COM+ application.
